editViewFields.name: accessibility
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Enables tabbing and arrow key navigation

editViewFields.name: centerMode
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Enables centered view with partial prev/next slides. Use with odd numbe}red slidesToShow counts.

editViewFields.name: centerPadding
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Side padding when in center mode. (px or %)

editViewFields.name: customPaging
editViewFields.fieldLabel: a	Custom paging templates. See source for use example.

editViewFields.name: dotsClass
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Class for slide indicator dots container

editViewFields.name: edgeFriction
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Resistance when swiping edges of non-infinite carousels

editViewFields.name: appendArrows
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Change where the navigation arrows are attached (Selector, htmlString, Array, Element, jQuery object)

editViewFields.name: appendDots
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Change where the navigation dots are attached (Selector, htmlString, Array, Element, jQuery object)

editViewFields.name: mobileFirst
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Responsive settings use mobile first calculation

editViewFields.name: lazyLoad
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Accepts 'ondemand' or 'progressive' for lazy load technique

editViewFields.name: pauseOnDotsHover
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Pauses autoplay when a dot is hovered

editViewFields.name: respondTo
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Width that responsive object responds to. Can be 'window', 'slider' or 'min' (the smaller of the two).

editViewFields.name: responsive
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Object containing breakpoints and settings objects (see demo). Enables settings sets at given screen width. Set settings to "unslick" instead of an object to disable slick at a given breakpoint.

editViewFields.name: rows
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Setting this to more than 1 initializes grid mode. Use slidesPerRow to set how many slides should be in each row.

editViewFields.name: slidesPerRow
editViewFields.fieldLabel: With grid mode intialized via the rows option, this sets how many slides are in each grid row. dver

editViewFields.name: slidesToShow
editViewFields.fieldLabel: # of slides to show at a time

editViewFields.name: slidesToScroll
editViewFields.fieldLabel: # of slides to scroll at a time

editViewFields.name: swipeToSlide
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Swipe to slide irrespective of slidesToScroll

editViewFields.name: touchThreshold
editViewFields.fieldLabel: To advance slides, the user must swipe a length of (1/touchThreshold) * the width of the slider.

editViewFields.name: rtl
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Change the slider's direction to become right-to-left

editViewFields.name: waitForAnimate
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Ignores requests to advance the slide while animating

editViewFields.name: zIndex
editViewFields.fieldLabel: Set the zIndex values for slides, useful for IE9 and lower
